resources.string: The installation is almost done! So you want to know more about XOSP? Well XOSP basically which stands for Xperia Open Source Project is a project based on CM and the main idea is to create a custom minimal Xperia based ROM, by including the essential things which a user would use from a ROM.If you came here without flashing the XOSPApps reboot in recovery and do it right now cause the apps are essentials to the ROM %s.

The installation is almost done! So you want to know more about XOSP? Well XOSP basically which stands for Xperia Open Source Project is a project based on CM and the main idea is to create a custom minimal Xperia based ROM, by including the essential things which a user would use from a ROM.If you came here without flashing the XOSPApps reboot in recovery and do it right now cause the apps are essentials to the ROM %s.
